topic.title: ZeroMail User Data base
topic.body:
Would it be possible to create a zite or hub that "stores" ZeroID's so that all the variants of ZeroMail could use? So if I clone ZeroMail, edit it and call it ZeroMail-Beta, and send a Mail to someone that uses the original ZeroMail without him/her needed to enter once my zite. 

Tbh I don't exacly know how ZeroMail let's you send mails to ZeroUsers but i suppose they use a shared database but you need to enter once.

But yeah, would it be possible?

topic.title: How to make the big topics in ZeroTalk.
topic.body: If I clone the zite to create my own ZeroTalk, would it come with the hability to create the big topics? I mean the ones I can make topics inside of.

1537635371_15hL2gR4oCSgKBbndn3MxY8Hc5xoy.body:
> [swastika](#comment_11_1b9urVTLtAAZAidg6hchWqhrVtYXUaoj7): What's KopyKate?

its like a youtube kind of zite.

1538390842_18dhkzcDYd4zCD8Vtb47ULAciCuoy.body:
> [polar2](#comment_20_14ytAKDfNjArMTqGecTi7ginG3aZTsRAum): This is called "catalog" or "folder"

And where can I find that if I clone the zite? Do I need to do it from the actual file?

> [polar2](#comment_21_14ytAKDfNjArMTqGecTi7ginG3aZTsRAum): Start a normal topic [...]

ok thanks!
